name: Round Runner
description:
A game I made in Unity3D 5.0.1f1, to see how fast I can clone a game. This game is based on Boombit's "Running Circles" game, but of course mine is not as feature-rich. :P

This game was made in a total of about 7 full-working days, spanning across two weeks.

Programming: LWY

Art: LWY

BGM by Syncopica, link: http://opengameart.org/content/calm-bgm.

SFX was taken from "2000 Game SFX Collection" by GameBurp, link: http://www.gameburp.com/

Controls:

  • Click screen / Spacebar = flip in or outside a circle
  • Escape = quit game
